timeline.bodyText: I'd like to have more informative docs. Not sure if you were planning on adding that later.
timeline.author: rickle-msft

replies.bodyText: yep, I will add more information as I understand more about ChangeFeed and add more related classes.
replies.author: gapra-msft

timeline.bodyText: I think we can just say using the URL (or endpoint) and pipeline of the passed client. I don't think we need to specify that we use the getters.
timeline.author: rickle-msft

timeline.bodyText: Are we planning on adding options? Or should we change the doc?

replies.bodyText: Let me change the doc for now and add it if we do end up adding options
